llm_res.rule: totalSupply should return the total token supply.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
The decimals function is optional but not implemented, which can affect interoperability and usability in some scenarios.
llm_res.function: Not applicable as the function is missing.

llm_res.rule: MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
